scripts.build: cd backend && npm install && cd ../fronted && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && rm -rf backend/dist && cp -r fronted/dist backend/
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix fronted"
scripts.test: npm run test:build && npm run test:start
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:build && npm run test:start
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../fronted && npm install && cd ..
